text: Millerton is a community in Dutchess County, New York, United States. The town borders Taconic State Park. ==Local people of note== * Eddie Collins, Hall of Fame baseball player. * Sandy Berger, United States National Security Advisor during the second term of Bill Clinton * Don Hastings, Brooklyn born Actor residing in Millerton. * Karl Moody, Actor/Entertainer raised in Millerton. Born in nearby Sharon, CT. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state) Category:Dutchess County, New York
title: Millerton, New York
